level.heading: ISSUANCE AND DISPLAY OF LICENSE (ยง 17-3104)

level.text: 3104.1 The Director shall issue a license to a funeral services establishmentf the Director determines that it is in compliance with the act and thishapter.
3104.2 A licensee shall display the license and certificate of occupancy in aonspicuous place on the premises.

3104.3 The Director shall issue a license only for the premises and person orersons named as applicants in the application. The license is not valid forse by any person or at any place other than that designated in the license.
Any transfer as to ownership or location without the approval of the directorhall cause the immediate forfeiture of the license.
3104.4 A license is the property of the District Government and shall beeturned to the Director immediately upon any of the following events:
Suspension or revocation of the license;
Denial of renewal of the license;
Source: Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 7853, 7856 (October 23, 1992).
